de.fhg.fokus.restac.httpx.core.common
Class HTTPXActionMessage

java.lang.Object
  de.fhg.fokus.restac.httpx.core.common.HTTPXAbstractMessage
      de.fhg.fokus.restac.httpx.core.common.HTTPXActionMessage

public class HTTPXActionMessage
extends HTTPXAbstractMessage

Stores an HTTP Request as defined in RFC 2616. Subclass of HTTPXAbstractMessage.

Author:
Murat Ates
See Also:
RFC 2616

public HTTPXActionMessage(java.lang.String method,

                          java.lang.String host,
                          int port,
                          Path path,
                          ParameterList query,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers,
                          java.io.InputStream in)
Constructs a new HTTPXActionMessage with the specified attributes.

Parameters:
method - the method of the Http request
protocol - the protocol of the requested URL (e.g. 'http')
host - the host of the requested resource
port - the port number of the host of the requested resource
path - the path of the requested resource
query - the query of the request
headers - the headers of the HTTP request
in - the InputStream of the HTTP request
